channel.title: How do i make a server?
channel.description:
Guys i need help on how to make a server. if you caould please send me a EFFICIENT link i would appreciate it. Or you can give me a step by step guide. thanks
Reply back!

item.title: How do i make a server?
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

Just go to the Tutorials Section and find a Tutorial that shows you how to.
You also have 3 choices to choose making a server from- MySQL, Hamachi, No-ip.

Go to the Tutorial Section to find out more.

Or try here _____ EDIT: go here instead http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,189074.0.html

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a server?
